lead_paragraph: The union for Amtrak’s locomotive engineers urged the railroad on Tuesday to put a second crew member at the controls of trains on the busy Northeast Corridor.

headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Union Seeks Backup at Train Controls
headline.main: Pennsylvania: Union Seeks Backup at Train Controls

snippet: The union for Amtrak’s locomotive engineers urged the railroad on Tuesday to put a second crew member at the controls of trains on the busy Northeast Corridor.
